text:
@GavinNewsom CA’s response to #Covid19 is #antiscience.

COVID is reported on death certificates when ASSUMED to have caused or contributed to DEATH. 

NO LAB TEST REQUIRED.

THATS NOT #SCIENCE. 

THATS #FRAUD
